title: Westernbödefeld
text:
Westernbödefeld is a locality in the municipality <a href="Schmallenberg">Schmallenberg</a> in the district <a href="Hochsauerlandkreis">Hochsauerlandkreis</a> in <a href="North%20Rhine-Westphalia">North Rhine-Westphalia</a>, Germany.
The village has 338 inhabitants and lies in the north of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 443 m. Westernbödefeld borders on the villages of <a href="Brabecke">Brabecke</a>, <a href="B%C3%B6defeld">Bödefeld</a>, Gellinghausen, Dornheim and Frielinghausen. In the village centre the river Palme flows in the <a href="Brabecke%20%28Valme%29">Brabecke</a> and the <a href="Landstra%C3%9Fe">Landstraße</a> 776 meets the Landstraße L 740. 
Westernbödefeld was first mentioned in 1314 in a document. The village used to belong to the municipality of Bödefeld Land in Amt Fredeburg until the end of 1974.
